description:
If the network api class do not support DNS operations a generic error is returned instead of NotImplemented.
Ex:  
nova dns-list www.google.com --name sss
ERROR: The server has either erred or is incapable of performing the requested operation. (HTTP 500) (Request-ID: req-43fce7be-5eb9-4a7f-a51c-c6473faf33de)
title: Float IP DNS not handling NotImplemented Error

comments.content:
If the network api class do not support DNS operations a generic error is returned instead of NotImplemented.
Ex:  
nova dns-list www.google.com --name sss
ERROR: The server has either erred or is incapable of performing the requested operation. (HTTP 500) (Request-ID: req-43fce7be-5eb9-4a7f-a51c-c6473faf33de)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~leandro-i-costantino

comments.content:
The reproduce doesn't work for me.

os1:~> nova dns-list www.google.com --name sss
ERROR (NotFound): DNS entries not found. (HTTP 404) (Request-ID: req-efdc4a3b-1d0a-4f71-a047-df1b4b279084)


 Please reopen if you have a more detailed reproduce.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague

comments.content:
Change abandoned by Sean Dague (<email address hidden>) on branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/80812
Reason: This review is > 4 weeks without comment, and failed Jenkins the last time it was checked. We are abandoning this for now. Feel free to reactivate the review by pressing the restore button and leaving a 'recheck' comment to get fresh test results.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: Removing "In Progress" status and assignee as change is abandoned.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dims-v

comments.content:
I can not reproduce this. I will get a HTTPNotImplemented error if using neutron network.

HTTPNotImplemented: The requested functionality is not supported. (HTTP 501) (Request-ID: req-3d8ba94d-b5b4-4b93-abea-97d92233e6c2)
ERROR (HTTPNotImplemented): The requested functionality is not supported. (HTTP 501) (Request-ID: req-3d8ba94d-b5b4-4b93-abea-97d92233e6c2)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~taget-9

comments.content: [Expired for OpenStack Compute (nova) because there has been no activity for 60 days.]
